item.title: Black vultures attack, kill cattle. Climate change one reason they're spreading north
item.description: Black vultures have killed and eaten several calves on Tom Karr’s cattle ranch in southeastern Ohio, a loss he says didn't happen two decades ago

item.title: Turkish court sentences hotel owner and 10 others to life for deadly fire that killed 78
item.description: A Turkish court has sentenced the owner of a ski resort hotel and 10 others to life in prison for severe negligence in a deadly fire

item.title: Instacart, DoorDash among companies offering discounts to SNAP recipients
item.description: Instacart says it will offer customers who receive SNAP benefits 50% on their next grocery order to ease strain as the government prepares to cut off ...

item.title: Xi and Carney, meeting in South Korea, try to rebuild China-Canada relations
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney have taken steps to mend their countries' fractured ties

item.title: Exxon posts strong quarterly earnings with production in Guyana and the Permian Basin picking up
item.description: Exxon Mobil’s third-quarter earnings beat Wall Street’s expectations, bolstered by strong Guyana and Permian Basin production
